title: 85. Kidz Bop 34 - KIDZ BOP Kids
text: by MaddieFromNY Sorry kids, but you guys are like 8, and you can't sing! You mess up amazing songs, but I've gotta give it to you you guys are funny to listen to. If you gave singing 5 years, and practiced at least 4 hours a week, then maybe you would be good. Biography Formed: 2001 in New York, NY Genre: Children's Music Years Active: '00s, '10s Razor & Tie's Kidz Bop series of singalong collections debuted in 2001. Known for their "kid-friendly" versions of hit singles that are re-recorded by session musicians and singers and the Kidz Bop Kids, a chorus of child singers, the compilations became popular with families who wanted cleaned-up versions of contemporary songs: beginning with 2005's Kidz Bop, Vol. 7, they routinely debuted within the Billboard Top Ten, and collectively have sold close to ten million copies total. Along with the... Top Albums and Songs by KIDZ BOP Kids 1.
